#################################################
[xaml]
#################################################
jgrid
	- standard grid with column and row definition
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jfont
	- font relatived attributes
----------------------------------------------------------------------

#################################################
[cs]
#################################################
jtry        
	- try catch block with Log.ReportError(ex)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jproperty 
	- property (get + set)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jext
	- extend existed class
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jcomment
	- comment block
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jlazyinit
	- lazy initialization
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jusing
	- include current project's core namespace
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jreg
	- region block
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jargv
	- Validate ArgumentPath
----------------------------------------------------------------------
jDependencyProperty
	- create a DependencyProperty
----------------------------------------------------------------------
